TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActivityPreviewDesigner extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 顯示預覽區中的子活動設計工具集合，當在預覽區中選取子設計工具時，則在工作流程設計介面上的預覽或編輯模式中顯示所選的活動設計工具。

span.span: Displays a collection of child activity designers in a preview strip and, when a child designer is selected on the preview strip, displays the selected activity designer in preview or edit mode on a workflow design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 為循序的活動設計工具，會顯示其設計介面上方區域中顯示的所有子活動設計工具。 is a sequential activity designer that displays all of its child activity designers in a strip that appears at the top of its design surface. 當選取其中一個子設計工具時，它會顯示在區域下方活動預覽設計工具主應用程式的預覽視窗中。When one of the child designers is selected, its representation is displayed in a preview window that the activity preview designer hosts below the strip. 具有預覽模式和編輯模式。The has a preview mode and an edit mode. 預覽模式讓使用者無需捲動即可檢視所選設計工具的完整展示，但預覽模式無法讓使用者修改所選的活動設計工具。Preview mode allows the user to view the entire representation of the selected designer without scrolling; however, preview mode does not allow the user to modify the selected activity designer. 編輯模式可讓使用者修改所選的活動設計工具。Edit mode allows the user to modify the selected activity designer.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何覆寫 屬性，以便插入 的自訂動詞動作。The following example demonstrates how to override the property to insert custom verb actions for a . `CreateActivityVerbs` 會建立名稱為 的新 `"Add New Parallel Branch"`，並與名稱為 `OnAddParallelBranch` 的事件處理常式產生關聯。The `CreateActivityVerbs` creates a new named `"Add New Parallel Branch"` and associates an event handler named `OnAddParallelBranch`. 在工作流程設計工具中按一下此動詞時，會呼叫事件處理常式。When the verb is clicked in the workflow designer, the event handler is called. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#73](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#73)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#73](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#73)]
